title: New Age Acupuncture & Oriental Medicine - Portsmouth, RI
description: 1 review of New Age Acupuncture & Oriental Medicine "I started seeing Bok Nam several months ago for various health issues and already noticed significant improvement. I can't say enough how caring, attentive and professional she is. I have been to various acupuncturists before, but never experienced this level of care. Bok Nam really listens and takes her time to understand and research the problem, never in the rush and gives you full attention for the whole duration you are there. The office is super clean and in the great location, right by the Coolidge corner T stop. I already sent my husband there and would recommend Bok Nam to anyone who needs help."
